com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.schema

Interface TitanConfiguration

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TitanManagement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ManagementSystem, TitanFactory.Builder, UserModifiableConfiguration

    public interface TitanConfiguration
    Used to read and change the global Titan configuration. The configuration options are read from the graph and affect the entire database.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String get(String path)
      Returns a string representation of the provided configuration option or namespace for inspection.
      TitanConfiguration set(String path, Object value)
      Sets the configuration option identified by the provided path to the given value.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        String get(String path)
        Returns a string representation of the provided configuration option or namespace for inspection.

        An exception is thrown if the path is invalid.

        Parameters:
        path -
        Returns:

      • set

        TitanConfiguration set(String path,
                     Object value)
        Sets the configuration option identified by the provided path to the given value.
        Parameters:
        path -
        value -
